name: refnum
description: The primary key for this record

name: schemaName
description: The name of the schema this column is defined in.

name: tableViewName
description: The name of the primary table/view this column is defined in.

name: nullable
description: Whether the collumn is a nullable or not null.

name: collection
description: Whether the collumn is a collection/array.

name: tableViewName2
description: The name of the secondary table/view (a derived view, a realized table), if applicable.

name: aggregate
description: The aggregate type of the column, if any.

name: title
description: The title of the formula/expression that may be associated with this column.

name: formula
description: The expression/formula that may be associated with this column.

name: measure
description: Whether this column is a formula defined as a measure or not.

name: htmlDoc
description: Pre-rendered html fragment with the full documentation for this formula.

name: referencedColumns
description: The list of columns this formula depends on.

name: referencedFormulas
description: The list of columns this formula depends on.

name: created
description: The timestamp for when the record was created. (TILDA.Catalog)

name: lastUpdated
description: The timestamp for when the record was last updated. (TILDA.Catalog)

name: deleted
description: The timestamp for when the record was deleted. (TILDA.Catalog)
